title: Zong partners with Pakistan idol to power nation’s biggest music phenomenon
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 13 (APP): Zong, Pakistan’s leading technology innovation company, has partnered with Pakistan Idol as its official digital partner, bringing technology, entertainment, and connectivity together like never before.
This landmark collaboration underscores Zong’s commitment to empowering Pakistan’s digital evolution and transforming how audiences experience the nation’s biggest musical event, said a news release.
Built for the youth, digital, dynamic, and future-focused, Zong continues to lead as Pakistan’s foremost digital brand. Through this partnership, Zong is creating a powerful digital platform for youth to showcase their potential, express their creativity, and perform on the nation’s most celebrated musical stage.
Further elevating the experience, Zong enables audiences to stream live episodes through the My Zong App (MZA), creating a seamless digital entertainment journey that bridges music and connectivity. This initiative reflects Zong’s dedication to delivering meaningful, tech-enabled experiences that connect people to the moments they love most.
“Zong has always been at the forefront of Pakistan’s digital transformation,” said Sajid Munir, Head of Marketing at Zong.
“Our partnership with Pakistan Idol characterizes our belief in the power of technology to inspire creativity and self-expression. We’re proud to be enabling young Pakistanis to connect with their passion and showcase their talent on a platform that celebrates both innovation and music.”
Showtime with Zong celebrates the spirit of music, fandom, and digital lifestyle; positioning Zong at the heart of Pakistan’s entertainment journey. By integrating technology to amplify this initiative, Zong continues to drive Pakistan’s digital empowerment.
